verses.verse: A Psalm; a Song at the Dedication of the House. A Psalm of David. I will extol<WH7311> thee<WH3068>, O Jehovah; For thou hast raised me up<WH1802>, And hast not made my foes<WH341> to rejoice over me<WH8055>.
O Jehovah<WH3068> my God<WH430>, I cried<WH7768> unto thee<WH7495>, and thou hast healed me.
O Jehovah<WH3068>, thou hast brought up<WH5927> my soul<WH5315> from Sheol<WH7585>; Thou hast kept me alive<WH2421>, that I should not go down<WH3381> to the pit<WH953>.
Sing <WH2167> praise unto Jehovah<WH3068>, O ye saints<WH2623> of his<WH3034>, And give thanks to his holy<WH6944> memorial name<WH2143>.
For his anger<WH639> is but for a moment<WH7281>; His favor<WH7522> is for a life-time<WH2416>: Weeping<WH1065> may tarry<WH3885> for the night<WH6153>, But joy<WH7440> cometh in the morning<WH1242>.
As for me<WH559>, I said in my prosperity<WH7959>, I shall never<WH5769> be moved<WH4131>.
Thou <WH3068>, Jehovah, of thy favor<WH7522> hadst made my mountain<WH2042> to stand<WH5975> strong<WH5797>. Thou didst hide<WH5641> thy face<WH6440>; I was troubled<WH926>.
I cried<WH7121> to thee<WH3068>, O Jehovah; And unto Jehovah<WH3068> I made supplication<WH2603>:
What profit<WH1215> is there in my blood<WH1818>, when I go down<WH3381> to the pit<WH7845>? Shall the dust<WH6083> praise<WH3034> thee<WH5046>? shall it declare thy truth<WH571>?
Hear <WH8085>, O Jehovah<WH3068>, and have mercy<WH2603> upon me<WH3068>: Jehovah, be thou my helper<WH5826>.
Thou hast turned<WH2015> for me my mourning<WH4553> into dancing<WH4234>; Thou hast loosed<WH6605> my sackcloth<WH8242>, and girded<WH247> me with gladness<WH8057>;
To the end that my glory<WH3519> may sing<WH2167> praise to thee<WH1826>, and not be silent. O Jehovah<WH3068> my God<WH430>, I will give thanks<WH3034> unto thee for ever<WH5769>.
